title: Malcolm Certain
text:
Welcome! I’m Malcolm, an undergraduate at Brown University studying Applied Mathematics - Economics and Urban Studies. I’m interested in the application of quantitative methods to a range of topics in economics, particularly public policy. I have research experience under multiple top scholars in economics spanning the fields of education, political economy, health, and public economics. Outside of research and coursework, I like to play video games, try new restaurants, and write and solve puzzles.
